1:
Yahweh, God of my salvation,\q I cry out day and night before you.
\q
2:
Listen to my prayer;\q pay attention to my cry.


\q
3:
For I am filled with troubles,\q and my life has reached Sheol.
\q
4:
People treat me like those who go down into the pit;\q I am a man with no strength.


\q
5:
I am abandoned among the dead;\q I am like the dead who lie in the grave,
\q about whom you care no more
\q because they are cut off from your power.
\q
6:
You place me in the lowest part of the pit,\q in the dark and deep places.


\q
7:
Your wrath lies heavy on me,\q and all your waves crash over me.
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
8:
Because of you, my acquaintances avoid me.\q You have made me a shocking sight to them.
\q I am hemmed in and I cannot escape.


\q
10:
Will you do wonders for the dead?\q Will those who have died rise and praise you?
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
11:
Will your covenant faithfulness be proclaimed in the grave,\q your loyalty in the place of the dead?
\q
12:
Will your wonderful deeds be known in the darkness,\q or your righteousness in the place of forgetfulness?


\q
13:
But I cry to you, Yahweh;\q in the morning my prayer comes before you.
\q
14:
Yahweh, why do you reject me?\q Why do you hide your face from me?


\q
15:
I have always been afflicted and on the verge of death since my youth.\q I have suffered from your terrors; I am in despair.
\q
16:
Your angry actions have passed over me,\q and your terrifying deeds have annihilated me.


\q
17:
They surround me like water all the day long;\q they have all encircled me.
\q
18: You have removed every friend and acquaintance from me.\q My only acquaintance is the darkness.
